attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I propose that a vote of no confidence be made in this labour government.
My reasons for this are as follows.
1. The act of persecution of the lowest in our society, persuing the sick and infirm
without good cause.
2.Spending the countries money on keeping other countries afloat.
3. Corruption by MPs in the form of over inflated expense claims,and not declaring outside intrests, nepotism.
4. Not representing the intrests of the voters that elected them.
5. entering us into an illegal war that has cost the lives of under equipped british serviceman.
these are just a few of my reasons for my petition but no doubt gagging orders will be enforced.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
